General.Name: Iconic Worldwide Bhd
General.Description: Iconic Worldwide Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in tourism and property businesses in Malaysia. It operates through four segments: Property Development, Manufacturing, Tourism services, and Others. The company constructs and sells commercial properties. It also provides hospitality management and related services; operates as a hotelier; and manufactures, distributes, and deals in personal protective equipment products and related appliances, primarily disposable face masks and gloves. The company was formerly known as Sanbumi Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Iconic Worldwide Berhad in August 2019. Iconic Worldwide Berhad is based in Bukit Mertajam, Malaysia.
